Development Toolkit ğŸ“¡

A comprehensive and user-friendly development toolkit to boost up your productivity ğŸš€.

  • terminal emulator: kitty

Try

eBPF virtual machine

The ebpf virtual machine uses 10 general-purpose registers (0-9), and additional register 10 which was used as a stack frame pointer (can only be read but not written). As a BPF program is executed, values get stored in these registers to keep track of state.

Class Application {
  var $path = '';


  public function response($data, $errMsg = 'success') {
      $ret = ['errMsg' => $errMsg,
          'data' => $data];
      $ret = json_encode($ret);
      header('Content-type: application/json');
      echo $ret;

  }

  public function auth() {
      $DIDICTF_ADMIN = 'admin';
      if(!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_DIDICTF_USERNAME']) && $_SERVER['HTTP_DIDICTF_USERNAME'] == $DIDICTF_ADMIN) {
          $this->response('æ‚¨å½“å‰å½“å‰æƒé™ä¸ºç®¡ç†å‘˜----è¯·è®¿é—®:app/fL2XID2i0Cdh.php');
          return TRUE;

          exit();
      }

  }
  private function sanitizepath($path) {
  $path = trim($path);//å»æ‰ç©ºæ ¼
  $path=str_replace('../','',$path);//è¿‡æ»¤ç¬¬ä¸€
  $path=str_replace('..\\','',$path);//è¿‡æ»¤ç¬¬äºŒ
  return $path;
}//

public function __destruct() {
  if(empty($this->path)) {
      exit();
  }else{
      $path = $this->sanitizepath($this->path);// ....//config/flag.php
      if(strlen($path) !== 18) {//../config/flag.php
          exit();
      }
      $this->response($data=file_get_contents($path),'Congratulations');
  }
  exit();
}
}

include 'Application.php';
class Session extends Application {

  //keyå»ºè®®ä¸º8ä½å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  var $eancrykey                  = '';
  var $cookie_expiration			= 7200;

  {
	if(parent::auth()) {
          $this->get_key();

              $data = 'DiDI Welcome you %s';
              $data = sprintf($data,$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']);

              parent::response($data,'sucess');
          }
      }

  }

  private function get_key() {
      //eancrykey  and flag under the folder
      $this->eancrykey =  file_get_contents('../config/key.txt');
  }

  public function session_read() {//target1: ç»•è¿‡æ‰€æœ‰false
      if(empty($_COOKIE)) {
           return FALSE;
      }//cookie not empty

      $session = $_COOKIE[$this->cookie_name];
      if(!isset($session)) {

      }//ddctf_id ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º

      $hash = substr($session,strlen($session)-32);//é•¿åº¦è¦å¤§äº32? 32ä½ä¹‹åçš„å†…å®¹
      $session = substr($session,0,strlen($session)-32);//ä¸€ç›´æˆªæ–­åˆ°å€’æ•°ç¬¬32ä½

      if($hash !== md5($this->eancrykey.$session)) {//key.txt å†…å®¹å’Œ ddctf_id å†…å®¹ç‰‡æ®µæ‹¼æ¥ å†md5 ç­‰äºddctf_id32ä½ä¹‹åçš„å†…å®¹
          parent::response("the cookie data not match",'error');

      $session = unserialize($session);//ddctf_id ååºåˆ—åŒ–


      if(!is_array($session) OR !isset($session['session_id']) OR !isset($session['ip_address']) OR !isset($session['user_agent'])){

      }//ddctf_id ååºåˆ—åŒ–ä¹‹åçš„å†…å®¹è¦æœ‰ session_id ip_address user_agent å†æ¥ä¸ªpath??

      if(!empty($_POST["nickname"])) {
          $arr = array($_POST["nickname"],$this->eancrykey);
          $data = "Welcome my friend %s";
          foreach ($arr as $k => $v) {
              $data = sprintf($data,$v);
          }
          parent::response($data,"Welcome");
      }//sprintæ ¼å¼åŒ–æ‰“å°å‡½æ•°åˆ©ç”¨ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¼ é€’è¿›å‚æ•°nickname = %S è®©å®ƒå¯ä»¥è¯»å–keyã€‚

      if($session['ip_address'] != $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) {
          parent::response('the ip addree not match'.'error');
          return FALSE;
      }//ip_address è¦å†™è‡ªå·±çš„ip

      if($session['user_agent'] != $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']) {
          parent::response('the user agent not match','error');
          return FALSE;
      }//user_agent å†…å®¹è¦å’Œ http_user_agentçš„åŒ¹é…
      return TRUE;

  }//çœ‹èµ·æ¥å¯ä»¥åŠ¨æ‰‹è„šçš„åªæœ‰session_id?

  private function session_create() {
      $sessionid = '';
      while(strlen($sessionid) < 32) {
          $sessionid .= mt_rand(0,mt_getrandmax());
      }

      $userdata = array(
          'session_id' => md5(uniqid($sessionid,TRUE)),
          'ip_address' => $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'],
          'user_agent' => $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'],
          'user_data' => '',
      );

      $cookiedata = serialize($
  );
      $cookiedata = $cookiedata.md5($this->eancrykey.$cookiedata);

          $cookiedata,
          $expire,
          $this->cookie_path,

          $this->cookie_secure
          );

}
